summary: This document is an email chain from July 13, 2020, forwarding and discussing the organization of files related to 'Epstein search warrant documents' stored on a drive named 'easystore (F:)'. It appears to be internal DOJ/FBI correspondence regarding the management of case materials.

persons.name: Stephen R. Flatley
persons.context: Recipient of an email regarding Epstein search warrant documents, indicating involvement in the case file management or investigation.

keyFacts: Internal emails dated July 13, 2020, discuss files labeled 'Epstein search warrant documents'.
Files are organized on a drive named 'easystore (F:)' in folders including 'documents', 'email', 'presentations', and 'spreadsheets'.
The correspondence involves a US Attorney's Office (NY) contractor and FBI Agent Stephen R. Flatley, indicating ongoing case management.
File modification dates (June-July 2020) show recent activity on these case materials post-Epstein's death.
The document is a record of internal administrative handling of investigative materials related to the Epstein case.
